title: Kaweco Classic Sport Ballpen—Bordeaux
description:
Timelessly beautiful - the Bordeaux ball pen of the Classic Sport series looks equally nostalgic and modern. The combination of this color and the golden elements is on point and conveys a particularly nostalgic charm.

The birth of the Kaweco Sport was back in 1911. The Classic series must not miss the writing system ballpoint pen. It has a length of 10.5 cm and works with a high-quality heart-curve mechanism. It works precisely and does not click when the push button is pressed.

  • Dimensions: 4.13 in.
  • Materials: Ball pen writing system
